  • Class
    Description
    AttendeeManager
    This class manages attendees for a given event.
    CameraFragment
    A view for handling camera activity within the app.
    CameraHandler
    This class handles camera and image related data.
    EventAdapter
    An adapter made so that users of the app can view events.
    EventAdapter.EventClickListener
    A listener for what to do when someone clicks on an event.
    EventAdapter.OnSettingButtonClickListener
    A listener for handling what to do when someone clicks on the settings button.
    EventManager
    This class manages a collection of events.
    Firebase
    This class is responsible for handling all interactions with Firebase.
    Firebase.OnAttendeeRegisteredListener
    A listener for when Attendees are registered in Firebase.
    Firebase.OnAttendeeRemovedListener
    A listener for when Attendees are removed from Firebase.
    Firebase.OnCheckInAttendeesLoadedListener
    A listener for when attendees check into an event through Firebase.
    Firebase.OnEventLoadedListener
    A listener for when an event is loaded from Firebase.
    Firebase.OnEventsLoadedListener
    A listener for when multiple events are loaded from Firebase.
    Firebase.OnEventUpdatedListener
    A listener for an event being updated in Firebase.
    Firebase.OnLocationsRetrievedListener
    A listener for when a location is retrieved from Firebase.
    Firebase.OnRegisteredAttendeesLoadedListener
    A listener for when a list of registered attendees are loaded from Firebase.
    Firebase.OnUploadCompleteListener
    Callback interface for handling upload completion.
    Firebase.OnUserCreatedListener
    A listener for when a user is created in Firebase.
    Firebase.OnUserEventsLoadedListener
    A listener for when a user's events are loaded from Firebase.
    Firebase.OnUserLoadedListener
     
    Firebase.OnUsersLoadedListener
    A listener for when multiple users are loaded from Firebase.
    Firebase.OnUserUpdatedListener
    A listener for when a user is updated in the Firebase.
    FirebaseMessages
    This class handles Firebase Cloud Messaging for sending and receiving messages.
    GalleryHandler
    Handles photo gallery usage within the app.
    GenzgptFMS
    This class handles the Firebase Messaging Service for this app FIXME: Currently does nothing
    GeolocationTracking
    This class handles Geolocation Tracking for the user, includes permission requests and location pulls.
    ImageViewUpdater
    A way to update ImageViews.
    ProfileGenerator
    Generates a deterministic profile picture based on a user's name.
    RandomStringGenerator
    A generator for random string data.
